item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: semona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row equal_col_height="yes" equal_col_valign="sm-bottom" css=".vc_custom_1445535317350{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1445542143907{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 95px !important;padding-bottom: 95px !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-5"][sm_custom_heading font_style="sm-semibold" uppercase="yes" underline_width="90"]Reach Us[/sm_custom_heading][sm_column_text]Ut consectetur eleifend lacinia. Cras nec odio ac massa sodales auctor. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Donec tortor risus, condimentum ut ante in.[/sm_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1445537402619{margin-top: 60px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sm_column_text css=".vc_custom_1445538195316{border-left-width: 4px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-left-color: #00aeef !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}"]
Office Address
9870 St Vincent Forantora Place, Glasgow, DC 45 Fr 45.[/sm_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sm_column_text css=".vc_custom_1445537380478{border-left-width: 4px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-left-color: #00aeef !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}"]
Phone Number
Telephone : + 1 600 336 7189 FAX :+1 800 889 9898[/sm_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sm_column_text css=".vc_custom_1445537629390{border-left-width: 4px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-left-color: #00aeef !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}"]
E-mail Address
myoffice@semonadomain.com support@semonadomain.com[/sm_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][sm_column_text css=".vc_custom_1445537590246{border-left-width: 4px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;border-left-color: #00aeef !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}"]
WORKING HOURS
Monday to Saturday 8 : 00 AM to 6 : 00 PM[/sm_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-7" css=".vc_custom_1445542139147{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][sm_image image="101"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" equal_col_height="yes" equal_col_valign="sm-middle" css=".vc_custom_1445539725781{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1445542128867{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 7% !important;padding-right: 7% !important;padding-bottom: 7% !important;padding-left: 7% !important;background-image: url(http://cleaning.semona.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/18/2015/10/contact-get-in-touch.jpg?id=112) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-6"][sm_column_text css=".vc_custom_1445539354483{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-color: rgba(0,174,239,0.85) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,174,239) !important;}"]Call Free +1 600 336 7180 [sm_separator el_width="100%" color="sm-white" margin_top="-20"] [sm_icon icon_type="pe_icon_7_stroke" icon_pe="pe-7s-map-marker"] 9870 St Vincent Place, Glasgow, DC 45 Fr 21. [sm_icon icon_type="pe_icon_7_stroke" icon_pe="pe-7s-mail"] example@semona.com[/sm_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column bg_color_preset="bg-color2" css=".vc_custom_1445542133092{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 95px !important;padding-right: 7% !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 7% !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-6"][sm_custom_heading font_style="sm-semibold" uppercase="yes" underline_width="90"]Get In Touch[/sm_custom_heading][sm_column_text]Nullam pellentesque suscipit velit, id lobortis leo pulvinar vitae.[/sm_column_text][sm_contact_form id="122" input_style="sm-style-solid" input_shape="sm-shape-rounded" button_style="sm-style-flat sm-size-lg" input_bg_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1445541920019{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][sm_google_map addresses="%5B%7B%22address%22%3A%221638%20Bedford%20Ave%2C%20Brooklyn%2C%20NY%2011225%2C%20USA%22%2C%22infobox_title%22%3A%22Semona%20Cleaning%20Comany%22%2C%22infobox_content%22%3A%221638%20Bedford%20Ave%2C%20Brooklyn%2C%20NY%2011225%2C%20USA%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
